name: chrome_t_rex
description: Chrome T-Rex Game with enhanced features

scripts.web:build: echo Creating web-dist directory... && if not exist web-dist mkdir web-dist && echo Copying files... && copy /Y index.html web-dist\ && copy /Y config-example.json web-dist\config.json && xcopy /E /I /Y img web-dist\img && xcopy /E /I /Y sound web-dist\sound && xcopy /E /I /Y styles web-dist\styles && xcopy /E /I /Y font web-dist\font && echo Copying JS files... && copy /Y *.js web-dist\
